wiki.summary: One of the best modern R&B voices is featured on the soundtrack for Fifty Shades of Grey. Would it be a complete soundtrack without Abel? Revealed on August 4th, 2015, “Earned It” is also featured on Beauty Behind the Madness, The Weeknd’s second studio album. Set to one of his most upbeat and orchestral instrumentals yet, he dances between classy and lecherous as he woos the one girl he truly loves. This mirrors Christian’s infatuation as he enjoys Ana’s (fleeting) innocence in the film. Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: One of the best modern R&B voices is featured on the soundtrack for Fifty Shades of Grey. Would it be a complete soundtrack without Abel? Revealed on August 4th, 2015, “Earned It” is also featured on Beauty Behind the Madness, The Weeknd’s second studio album. Set to one of his most upbeat and orchestral instrumentals yet, he dances between classy and lecherous as he woos the one girl he truly loves. This mirrors Christian’s infatuation as he enjoys Ana’s (fleeting) innocence in the film. “Earned It” became his solo breakout hit, earning him one of spring 2015’s biggest radio singles and the song won the Best R&B Performance at the 58th Annual Grammy Awards. Read more on Last.fm. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License; additional terms may apply.
